howToUse.title: How to Use Replace Person in Video with AI

steps.title: Upload Video and Extract Reference Frame
steps.content: Upload your video file (MP4, MOV, AVI) up to 15 seconds and 50MB for Replace Person in Video with AI processing. Our system automatically extracts the first frame to identify the person and establish the replacement reference.

steps.title: Transform Person in Reference Frame
steps.content: Apply person replacement to the extracted frame using our curated style templates, custom text prompts, or uploaded reference images to define how the person should be transformed or replaced.

steps.title: Select Model and Customization Options
steps.content: Choose the appropriate AI model for person replacement quality, add optional descriptive prompts to enhance the transformation, and configure your video duration preferences.

steps.title: Generate Person-Replaced Video
steps.content: Our Replace Person in Video with AI technology processes your complete video using the transformed reference frame, seamlessly replacing the person while maintaining all original motion patterns and video timing.
